content: Libras are known for their balance, fairness, and harmony. They are diplomatic and gracious, and they try to see both sides of an issue before making a decision. Libras are also known for their social skills and ability to make others feel at ease. They are cooperative and enjoy working with others towards a common goal. In personal relationships, Libras are known for their charm and ability to make others feel special. They value harmony in their relationships and may go to great lengths to avoid conflict.
